args.name: mockup-before-design
args.description: Before implementing any UI/UX design in code, first create a mockup in Pencil for user review and approval. Never proceed directly to code without visual validation.
args.trigger: When starting UI/UX implementation or design work
args.action: Create Pencil mockup first, get user approval, then implement in code

execution.error: No plan available for intent: unknown
